Yep, Soulstice, you sure know how to make Squawktalk live up to his name.  =
I love it when Squawktalk never shuts up!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 27, 2001 1=
0:35 PM
  Subject: Re: Cepta, meet Squawktalk...


  Agreed, well done =3DP=



  On 28 Apr 2001, at 2:11, Yanshosh@... wrote:

  > LOL. Great post,=
 Soulstice.
  > 
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p.=
..> wrote:
  > > Squawktalk, listening to Megatron, flies to Cepta.
  > > 
=
  > > Squawktalk: Hello, hello, you want the tour, right? Of course you 
  =
> do! Okay! Anyway, first of all, this is the main chamber, it serves 
  > =
well because it's main. It's where you are when you first walk in, 
  > it'=
s where you are when you see the door! It's where we go sometime 
  > to le=
ave the base, it's also where we go after we come in! It's got 
  > all the=
se cool computers and stuff, and tables and that and it's 
  > where we are=
 right now! Isn't that a coincidence? Well, anyway, it's 
  > a nice room m=
aybe a little too dusty but then again maybe not and 
  > it's a good room =
because it has lots of room, and it leads into all 
  > of the other rooms,=
 it's also one of the biggest rooms, which is 
  > good, because everyone m=
ight try to come in at the same time, and if 
  > they do and the room is r=
eally tiny then everyone will be crowded and 
  > the base might explode. A=
lso, it's big because something might happen 
  > like someone breaks in, a=
nd there might be a shootout and everyone 
  > will get shot if there isn't=
 much room, did I mention that? I don't 
  > think I did, correct me if I'm=
 wrong, but I know I'm not wrong 
  > because I'm right. Anyway, I'm Squawk=
talk and you are? I mean what's 
  > your name, I'm not calling you Squawkt=
alk, that would be silly, 
  > wouldn't it? I hope you have a nice name, yo=
u probably do, but I 
  > still hope, because hoping can get you stuff some=
times, and anyway, 
  > it's fun, so about your name, it should be nice bec=
ause my name is 
  > cool and I met you, didn't I? Anyhow, what I was tryin=
g to say is 
  > that maybe we've spent too long in this room, want to go t=
o the next 
  > room? It would be good because then we won't be in this roo=
m and 
  > we'll be in the next one instead and I can talk to you in there =
just 
  > hurry up and don't take forever, okay?...
